text: when Americans think about terrorism in
places like Pakistan they tend to focus
on RPGs and suicide bombs as at the
Marriott Hotel in Islamabad this year
but for Pakistani women one of the most
frightening forms of terrorism isn't
bombs its asset attacks often by their
own husbands you see look at Nima she
has lost her eyes never can you please
show us your face my dear she makes me
cry every time she comes in front of me
can we imagine a human being like that
she was a pretty woman a presentable
human beings
four years ago nyam Azhar was a
successful real estate agent she was
making a decent salary and then she
decided to divorce her deadbeat husband
whom she was only with in the first
place due to an arranged marriage look
what he's done to me it has been five
years since I've seen the faces of my
children since I lost my eyes the
husband was an idiot he used to just
sell fruits on the roadside and never
used to bring money to the house now I
receive custody of their three children
in exchange for a large payment to her
husband he has to come over one last
evening to say goodbye to the children
while Naima lay dosing her husband came
in with a bottle of acid he poured it
all over her the flesh of my cheeks was
falling off and the bones of my face
were showing and all of my skin was
falling off after the attack Naima's
husband fled neighbors heard her screams
and came running smoke was rising from
her burning flesh and she was running
about blindly crashing into walls she
underwent reconstructive surgery but
Naima remains blind and disfigured all
of the skin you see on my face now that
is from my legs since the attack Naima
has survived on the charity of friends
as well as help from women's rights
activist chana's Bukhari shahnaz is
trying to raise money for a surgery to
restore an IMSI site as well as to
prosecute Naeem as husband he was never
arrested by the police we need to get a
very strong lawyer for her to fight her
case and get the bastard paid lawyers we
can get hold of them and see that he
should brought to the gallows whatever
happens to Naima she's far from alone
across a swath of Asia acid attacks have
become a weapon of choice for angry
husbands spurned suitors and anyone else
seeking to destroy young women my
organization
they was the one who started
highlighting these cases of violence
China's boo carries progressive women's
association has documented more than
7,000 deliberate burnings of women in
just two Pakistani cities since 1994 in
some cases women were set on fire and
others acid was thrown at them only 2%
of those cases were successfully
prosecuted this message is as good as
saying okay hang all the 50% population
of this country all the woman they do
not deserve to be living we can bring
donkeys instead of them one way America
could help would be for Congress to pass
the International Violence Against Women
Act which Senators Biden and lugar have
co-sponsored it shines a spotlight on
this kind of brutality and nudges
governments to act for until the regions
governments get serious about
prosecuting attackers the terror will
continue to spread in the house we used
to live in there was a man who lived
upstairs he used to beat his wife and my
dad used to say look see how that man
burned his wife I will burn you in the
same way in Pakistan for the New York
Times I'm Nicholas Kristof
